functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"聖剣のレプリカ","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"有名な聖剣のレプリカ。","color":"white","italic":false}','{"translate":"レプリカとは言え聖剣としての力は本物で、","color":"white","italic":false}','{"translate":"闇を祓い、相手を弱体化する一閃を放つ。","color":"white","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" 断罪"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"断罪",Level:1,Interval:0,Trigger:"近接攻撃する",Count:1},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.35d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-2.4d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
